meanings.definition: A group consisting of parents and their children.
meanings.sent1: Many families enjoy spending time together on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The Smith family went on a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent3: The family of ducks waddled across the pond in a line.
meanings.sent4: The family of trees provided shade for the entire park.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the family of rabbits worked together to build a cozy burrow.
